PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-04062000-03-230,  ,  ,  HEALTH, 
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1068 - ESTABLISHMENT LICENCES AND GOOD MANUFACTURING PRACTICES) to the extent of recognizing certificates of compliance with "Good Manufacturing Practices" issued by regulatory bodies in other countries who are party to a Mutual Recognition Agreement in the medical devices and pharmaceuticals sectors, and by adapting other provisions in the Regulations accordingly.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2000-0120 Publication Date: 2000-04-12
